Description: * UAE Real Estate Market experience from 6-12 months***Applicants with father's/spouse visa sponsorship***With good spoken and written communication skills***Immediate joining***Ability to perform multi-task***Creative mindset and good knowledge about Social Media, such as draft e-flyers, reels and post videosPlease do not apply if you do not meet above qualifications********What we provide:friendly work environmentgood salary packageJob Description:- Make at least 150-200 calls to potential property owners and list new properties- Good knowledge on posting ads on property finder & bayut etc- Enter and update customer information in the database and prepare daily calling reports.- Go the “extra mile” to facilitate sales/lease:Skills
Skills: 1) Well versed with DLD- making form A, B, F
2) Should be able to prepare MOU
3) Follow up with Developers regarding NOCs
5) Follow up with existing property owners to inform them about contract renewals
6) Assist the director to facilitate viewings
7) Call and fix meetings with new potential buyers for off plan properties
